channel.title: Help with The Reaper Council?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Help with The Reaper Council?"

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded:
I'm pretty sure you only need Shorty and Strawberry as allies. There's no hidden requirements.
Over The Edge shouldn't be required to unlock The Reaper Council, though the jutsu will be needed to auto-win the last part, if you can't (or don't want to) do the 12d6s check at the end.

Double check if you have Shorty and Strawberry, and that you didn't do the quest yet. Or that you didn't hide it.

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: I'm pretty sure there's a hidden requirement to have your Reaper Bloodline. Go do Over the Edge and get your bloodline, and see if it unlocks.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I have the sword, Shorty, and Strawberry, and yet the quest won't spawn. Am I doing something wrong? Missing something?

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded:
Yeah. I pulled that mission off back in Chunin, when I didn't even have access to my sword jutsu. Was difficult pulling it off without that, but I managed in two or three attempts. But I did have my sword, and I remember it being required.

In short, it's doable if difficult without your sword jutsu, but you need the sword at least.

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: Point well taken. It's been a bit since I did that in S1.

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded:
If that were all ( according to the mission page ), then I woulda done that a little while back. After the check to withstand the spiritual pressure, you have to show them a Sword of the Reaper.

I've been waiting on that so that Season 1 could last a bit longer for me by getting the sword at a higher level; more AP needed to replace the levels lost.

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: Strawberry and Shorty are the only things required to unlock the mission. You could probably do it as a Chunin if you were lucky. However, you'll likely need your Sword jutsu to have a chance at reasonably passing it.

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: As he said, he was looking for how to -unlock- the mission. I don't have a sword, and I've unlocked it, meaning that the sword isn't a required to unlock, though it is needed inside the actual mission.

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: to get the mission u'll need to be Sp. jonin and get Shorty and Strawberry and ur sword. U dont need to have the shikai ability or ur sword release although it does help having them

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: Yeah, sounds like it. I know I had both when I did the mission.

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: *sigh* so i need to get shorty and strawberry to unlock the mission? (thats what im wanting to know is how do i unlock it*

item.title: Re: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded: According to the looping guide, you need both Shorty and Strawberry. Looking at the mission, it seems as though you'd also need your sword.

item.title: Help with The Reaper Council?
item.content:encoded:
http://bvswiki.com/mission:the-reaper-council

How does on start that mission? (About to finished the 3 days in the hole will finish in about 5 hours.)
